channel.title: Please help me
channel.description:
Ok well ive been reading these forums for some time now, expecially the topics about scar. Now im wondering where i can download it/ and if you can't use scar anymore tell me please, or tell me if theresn another program i can use like it that does the same thing.
All help would be appriciated.
